select.video: Select a video file to upload...

placeholder.keyWords: Add keywords mentioned in the video splitted by comma ( , )
placeholder.transcription: After convert your video into an audio, the generated transcription will be shown here...
placeholder.prompt: Type your instructions for AI here or select on the side menu a pre-defined prompt (Title or Description)!
placeholder.result: The result generated by AI using the instructions above will be shown here...

text.models: You will can choose another models in the future
text.rememberEnd: variable in your prompt to add a transcription content to uploaded video!
text.temperature: Higher values means more creative results, but with more possibility of errors
